name: spreadsheetSetCellFormula
description: Specifies the formula for an Excel spreadsheet object cell.

examples.title: Script Example
examples.code:
//Create a new Excel spreadsheet object. theSheet=SpreadsheetNew(); //Set the values of column 3 rows 1-10 to the row number. for (i=1; i<= 10; i=i+1) SpreadsheetSetCellValue(theSheet,i,i,3); //Set the fomula for the cell in row 11 column 3 to be the sum of //Columns 1-10. SpreadsheetSetCellFormula(theSheet,"SUM(C1:C10)",11,3); //Get the formula from the Excel spreadsheet object. theValue=SpreadsheetGetCellFormula(theSheet,11,3); //Get the value of row 11 column 5 from the Excel spreadsheet object. theValue=SpreadsheetGetCellValue(theSheet,11,3); Row 11, Column 3 value: #SpreadsheetGetCellValue(theSheet,11,3)#
Row 11, Column 3 formula: #SpreadsheetGetCellFormula(theSheet,11,3)#
